S

setActive(Bound) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Collider
sets the bound to active unless it's a ghost
active bounding boxes check all other boxes for collisions
setGhost(Bound) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Collider
sets the bounding box to ignore all collisions
setHeight(float) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Bound
scales the height to be of size newHeight
the topmost y position remains the same
setHeight(float) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Polygon

setPassive(Bound) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Collider
sets the bounding box to passive.
setSolid(Bound) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Collider
makes the bounding box able to detect collisions again
setUpdateThreshold(long) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Collider
sets the threshold determining how frequently we check for more collisions
setUserData(Collidable) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Bound
set the node that this bounding box represents
setWidth(float) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Bound
scales the width to be of size newWidth
the leftmost x position remains the same

setX(float) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Bound
moves the object so that the rectangle enclosing it has its leftmost edge at x = newX
setX(float) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Polygon
 
setX(float) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Rectangle
sets the left most position of the rectangle
setY(float) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Bound
moves the object so that the rectangle enclosing it has its uppermost edge at y = newY
setY(float) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Polygon
 
setY(float) - Method in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Rectangle

shapeMap - Variable in class com.projecthawkthorne.hardoncollider.Collider
